Articles.Content:
First i would like to tell the problem to everybody,

I have this probe core in space, and it has so much actions like active engine etc. But i can't press on the bloody thing because of the window with actions. ITS TO BLOODY SMALL

Does somebody know a mod/fix for this issue?

main mod: realism overhaul

If you are playing in sandbox mode, I'd suggest using action groups with keys assigned to do certain tasks.

If you are playing career mode and do not have action groups yet, I would then suggest zoom in as close as you can, then left click somewhere on the probe core housing...

Best of luck...

nailed it, i came up with a fix: Hold the scroll wheel and then drag to the side where all the buttons are you need to press (in my case downwards)
